segments.text: I see the sunlight dancing across the dishes as the woman wipes them dry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The simplicity of the moment is beautiful, yet there’s a storm brewing behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I watch the boy's determination as he leans precariously towards the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel my heart race at the thought of him toppling off that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands there, wide-eyed, waiting for her cookie, completely enchanted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t see the risk, but all I can think about is the water pooling at their feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can such a mundane scene feel so hazardous?
segments.speaker: PAR
